title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: Dey salute every person wey dey this house and I use this opportunity to introduce my self: my name na Riginac111 I be una pikin wey join for una house I no say from today I Don become one of unaThe tori wey i carry come gum body here, na tori wey concern us wey dey nigeria and our African country wey dem call nigerUna Don hear wetin dey happen for our country nigeria, the soldiers of niger dey sama warning dey give our presido wey be Ahmed Tinubu say make e remove hand for anything we concern them and dey talk say as our presido wey Ahmed Tinubu be ecowas chairman say make drm no put mouth for wetin concern them, because president tinubu put mouth because of Niger president wey military people arrest and put the man for hostage wey other people dey call cell.The soldiers of niger dey sama warning dey give nigeria president make e comot in hand for the matter and they also sama warning give all the ecowas ( Economic Community of West Africa State) leaders for other countries in Africa, but our presido wey be Tinubu wey the chairman of ecowas say wetin in give niger soldiers na seven (7) days to release their president otherwise he will deploy soldiers for nigeria to go for war ( attack) for niger, na the soldiers of  niger come verse say they are waiting for nigeria. The president of America Don also sama warning give niger military to desist from the coup dey plan for their president they hold hostage, but French country presido na him dey give niger soldiers support and also sama warning give Tinubu say e no win election for nigeria say make e no dey put mouth for the matter. https://www.google.com/search?q=niger+and+ecowas&client=ms-android-samsung-ss&sxsrf=AB5stBid_dMERELZbKj0m-qkPi-YbKteEw%3A1690828918514&ei=dgDIZKL-Hv-nhbIPoPC3sAE&oq=Niger+and+ec&gs_lp=EhNtb2JpbGUtZ3dzLXdpei1zZXJwIgxOaWdlciBhbmQgZWMqAggAMgQQABgDMgYQABgWGB4yBhAAGBYYHjIGEAAYFhgeMgYQABgWGB4yBhAAGBYYHjIGEAAYFhgeMgYQABgWGB5IhrIBUKgzWPdzcAJ4ApABAJgBgAOgAcsZqgEGMi0xMC4yuAEByAEA-&sclient=mobile-gws-wiz-serp

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: The thread may sounds funny but it's a serious matter that exposes the continuous political and economic modern slavery system that's still in place in Africa in the form of neo-colonialism.Niger is one of the poorest countries' in Africa that heavily depends on international aides to sustain it's economy which is an error for a country with such influential natural resource like uranium in this modern age of technology. But just like all other African countries that are not feeling the benefits of the naturally resources embedded in their country lands Niger not an exception has been facing hunger challenges and economical drawbacks over the years while some former colonial powers in Europe and those of the West are benefitting from the resources in furtherance technical development to their countries  and continent.ECOWAS is nothing but a stooge in Western hands, and a complete disappointment to west Africa and the continent entirely with it leaders no different from the ousted president Mohammed Bazoum as they are of same camp of looters of their respective countries' resources.IMO the Niger military only doing the right thing by intervening in salvaging their country from further economic devastation and every well meaning person in the interest of Niger will so much be a proponent of the military action. Where political has mismanaged and bastardized the country economy the military is always the last hope of intervention to bring things to order and making for accountability.All international bodies in the West and Europe threatening sanctions on Niger military are doing so because the act of the military would put a stop in the pillaging of the uranium in Niger to their   respective country and not that those sanctions are in the interest of the democracy of Niger. And they are using ECOWAS in the forefront to perpetrate their interest.
